did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: A series of drawings made for Great Lakes Engineering Works by Mr. Vernon Howe Bailey of New York.

scopecontent.p: A series of drawings made for Great Lakes Engineering Works by Mr. Vernon Howe Bailey of New York. Drawings show model steel ship construction in various stages.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Great Lakes Engineering Works Drawings #5191 G. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
